channel.description: Recent content in Homelab on BlakeAnneberg.com

item.title: Homelab for learning
item.description: I finally have enough old equipment to start a homelab. Some of it includes Old WAPs Network switches Cloudcore router Firewall Fiber and SFPs Old micro desktops Possible old working server What I have for plans is to create this homelab and then somehow set up a way to remotely log into it. But I really have no idea how to do this right now. Also I don’t know where it should be placed… and where a good spot would be for it to live.
